## Benchmark

### Just open and close the device

```{r}
#| label: bench1
#| eval: false

library(ggplot2)

file <- tempfile(fileext = '.png')

res <- bench::mark(
  wgpugd = {
    wgpugd::wgpugd(file, 10, 10)
    dev.off()
  },
  ragg =  {
    ragg::agg_png(file, 10, 10, unit = "in")
    dev.off()
  },
  min_iterations = 30
)

res

autoplot(res)
```


### Actual protting

```{r}
#| label: bench2
#| eval: false

set.seed(10)
dsamp <- diamonds[sample(nrow(diamonds), 1000), ]

res <- bench::mark(
  wgpugd = {
    wgpugd::wgpugd(file, 10, 10)
    ggplot(dsamp, aes(carat, price)) +
      geom_point(aes(colour = clarity))
    dev.off()
  },
  ragg =  {
    ragg::agg_png(file, 10, 10, unit = "in")
    ggplot(dsamp, aes(carat, price)) +
      geom_point(aes(colour = clarity))
    dev.off()
  },
  min_iterations = 30
)

res

autoplot(res)
```
